name: Rail 24V
headline: 1.2 m linear LED rail with full-range audio
description: Rail 24V is a 1.2 m architectural light with integrated full-range speakers, driven at 24 V for workplace, residential, and hospitality projects.
story: Rail 24V fuses warm, homogeneous linear light with a distributed line of full-range cone drivers. It’s designed so integrators can treat sound and light as a single, clean architectural element instead of separate fixtures.
definition: 1.2 m linear LED luminaire with integrated professional audio, powered at 24 V DC.
drivers: 3 × 1" × 5" neodymium cone drivers (line array) inside the profile
specs: Type: Audio + Light linear rail
Length 1190 mm with homogeneous LED emission
24 V constant-voltage power supply
Multiple optic options (symmetric, asymmetric, diffused, electrified track variants)
Pairs with K-array Kommander amplifiers for audio presets

lifestyle.alt: Rail 24V linear audio and light integration

name: Rail 48V
headline: 48 V architectural rail for long runs and larger spaces
description: Rail 48V keeps the same 1.2 m audio + light concept but runs at 48 V DC, ideal for longer lines and more demanding commercial installations.
story: When projects need longer cable runs, more fixtures on a line, and the same Rail aesthetic, the 48 V version becomes the backbone of the system. It combines a 1.2 m LED profile with full-range distributed audio, ready for DALI and K-array amplification.
definition: 1.2 m audio + light linear luminaire powered at 48 V DC for extended installations.
drivers: 3 × 1" × 5" neodymium cone transducers with dedicated amplifier presets
specs: Type: Audio + Light
Dimensions: approx. 1190 × 35 × 92 mm
48 V constant-voltage operation
Electronic remote driver with DALI-ready control
Compatible with K-array subs for extended low frequency response

lifestyle.alt: Rail 48V integrated linear lighting and audio

name: RAIL track ready 24V
headline: Audio + light module for 24 V multisystem tracks
description: RAIL track ready 24V slots directly into compatible 24 V multi-system tracks, bringing both linear lighting and full-range audio onto an electrified rail.
story: For galleries, retail concepts, and flexible hospitality layouts, RAIL track ready 24V uses a Stucchi-style electrified track inside the profile. Designers can reposition audio and light by sliding the module without rewiring the ceiling.
definition: 1.2 m audio + light module for 24 V electrified tracks with integrated full-range loudspeakers.
drivers: 3 × 1" × 5" neodymium cone drivers optimised for distributed background music
specs: Type: Audio + Light for 24 V multisystem track
Dimensions: approx. 1190 × 35 × 92 mm
24 V constant-voltage track connection
Cree / Osram LED engine with long lifetime
Standard 24 V control with DALI / Casambi-ready options

lifestyle.alt: RAIL track ready 24V in an electrified track system

name: RAIL track ready 48V
headline: 48 V track-ready rail for scalable audio + light layouts
description: RAIL track ready 48V combines a 1.2 m audio + light module with a 48 V electrified track interface, supporting longer runs and more fixtures from a single feed.
story: When projects demand extended track runs, more modules per line, and the same clean Rail language, the 48 V track-ready version is the go-to. It retains the full audio engine of Rail 48V, now with a built-in multisystem track channel for spot projectors and accessories.
definition: 1.2 m 48 V audio + light module designed to integrate into 48 V multisystem tracks.
drivers: 3 × 1" × 5" neodymium cone drivers with full-range and sub-assisted presets
applications: Large galleries and museums on 48 V tracks
Retail concepts requiring long runs and zoning
specs: Type: Audio + Light for 48 V multisystem track
Dimensions: approx. 1190 × 35 × 92 mm
48 V constant-voltage track operation
Integrated electrified track channel for projectors
Electronic remote driver, DALI-ready control

lifestyle.alt: RAIL track ready 48V module in a 48 V track system

name: RAIL S – DARKLIGHT
headline: Stealth point-source audio with low-glare DARKLIGHT optic
description: RAIL S DARKLIGHT pairs a miniaturised point-source loudspeaker with DARKLIGHT optics for controlled, glare-reduced illumination and wide audio coverage.
story: RAIL S DARKLIGHT is tuned for premium environments where fittings must almost disappear. The DARKLIGHT optic shapes the beam with low glare, while the K-array-powered point source delivers 140° wide coverage from a discrete aperture.
definition: 1.2 m architectural track module with integrated point-source loudspeaker and DARKLIGHT optic.
type: Track-based audio + light with DARKLIGHT optic
specs: Type: Audio + Light (track system)
Dimensions: approx. 1190 × 35 × 59 mm
Miniaturised point-source loudspeaker powered by K-array audio technology
DARKLIGHT low-glare optic for precise accent lighting
24 / 48 V remote driver with DALI / Casambi-ready control options

lifestyle.alt: RAIL S DARKLIGHT with low-glare architectural lighting

name: RAIL S – OPAL
headline: Soft opal diffusion with integrated point-source audio
description: RAIL S OPAL uses an opal diffuser for soft, homogeneous light while a concealed point-source driver delivers wide coverage audio through the same 1.2 m profile.
story: Where designers want softer, more diffuse light but still need integrated sound, RAIL S OPAL is the answer. It keeps the RAIL S point-source engine and 140° coverage, but replaces the DARKLIGHT optic with an opal diffuser for a smoother visual presence.
definition: 1.2 m track-based audio + light module with opal linear diffuser and integrated point-source speaker.
type: Audio + light track module with opal optic
applications: Soft ambient retail lighting with music
Corporate and hospitality spaces needing low-glare light
specs: Type: Audio + Light
Dimensions: approx. 1190 × 35 × 59 mm
Opal linear diffuser for soft, homogeneous light
Point-source audio with wide coverage and discrete appearance
Remote driver with DALI / Casambi-ready options

lifestyle.alt: RAIL S OPAL with soft linear diffusion
RAIL S OPAL profile detail with opal diffuser

name: RAIL S – TRACK
headline: RAIL S audio + light integrated into a track channel
description: RAIL S TRACK brings the RAIL S point-source audio engine and linear light into a module that nests inside a traditional track system.
story: For projects already built around track lighting, RAIL S TRACK adds integrated audio without changing the design language. It uses the same compact point-source driver as other RAIL S versions and maintains the same frequency response and wide 140° dispersion.
definition: Track-integrated audio + light module using RAIL S point-source loudspeaker and linear light.
specs: Type: Audio + Light, track configuration
Uses RAIL S point-source audio platform
Designed for traditional architectural track systems
Remote driver and smart-control ready
Matches the acoustic and lighting performance of other RAIL S variants

lifestyle.alt: RAIL S TRACK integrated into a lighting track
